EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-11-30
EmailTemplate.subject: "You Don't Think, You Just Do"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
November 30, 2017 <[[https://builttoadapt.io/that-moment-episode-7-you-dont-think-you-just-do-joe-andruzzi-bd0b5495ff1c?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> “You Don’t Think, You Just Do” In this special mini-sode of That Moment, three-time Super Bowl champion Joe Andruzzi shares his unexpected journey from offensive linemen to founder of a cancer foundation. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://builttoadapt.io/that-moment-episode-7-you-dont-think-you-just-do-joe-andruzzi-bd0b5495ff1c?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/four-years-of-building-tech-for-low-income-americans-2fa87805b6f2?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Four Years of Building Tech for Low-Income Americans Practical lessons and hopes for how tech can combat poverty from Blue Ridge Labs. Fighting Poverty with Tech <[[https://builttoadapt.io/four-years-of-building-tech-for-low-income-americans-2fa87805b6f2?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/blue-green-application-deployments-with-rabbitmq?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Blue-Green Application Deployments with RabbitMQ Learn how to handle blue-green deployment when RabbitMQ is being used as the message queue for the application. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/blue-green-application-deployments-with-rabbitmq?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/designing-for-millennial-parents-d12932dda6ef?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Designing for Millennial Parents Sara Mauskopf, CEO of Winnie, discusses how parents are changing and how technology isn't keeping up. Learn More <[[https://builttoadapt.io/designing-for-millennial-parents-d12932dda6ef?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/hands-free-pairing-9b5655debafb?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Hands-free Pairing Sean Olszewski gives some tips on paring with a colleague with an access need. Read More <[[https://builttoadapt.io/hands-free-pairing-9b5655debafb?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/design-restaurant-kiosks-for-people-not-just-speed-10d9d7842fb7?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Design Restaurants for People, Not Just Speed As fast food kiosks proliferate, Colby Sato asks, how can they be better designed? The UX of Kiosks <[[https://builttoadapt.io/design-restaurant-kiosks-for-people-not-just-speed-10d9d7842fb7?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/springone-platform-2017-preview-ep-86?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> SpringOne Platform 2017 Preview (Ep. 86) In this episode of Pivotal Conversations, Richard and Coté go over some of the highlights of SpringOne Platform, what to get out of the conference, and some recent infrastructure software news.
